Text: Hi, how are you? I just wanted to check in.
I feel anxious about work lately.
Hello! Looking forward to our session tomorrow.
Last week was really stressful, and I couldn't sleep.
Hey! Just letting you know I will be late.
That exercise you suggested helped me feel calmer.
Good morning! How are you today?
I have been struggling with motivation this week.
Talking about my childhood memories helped me reflect.
